review: **** ****** ** ********* * Went for Sugar control and cholesterol control. It has been 3 yrs since diagnosis . I am totally fine
Very good in treatment. Got threadmill test and 2D ECHO done as I had high cholesterol levels. Nice explanation ,focussed more on lifestyle changes than medicine . Definitely recommend
Treated my father in law with Stent . Now doing well and good .Thank you Dr Sasank for all the effort you put in for our family

Had heart failure with EF 30 percent and breathlessness .Cured me only with medication.All hospital outside asked to get admission . He is too good and gave me injection and sent me home . I was completely fine. Definitely recommend
Visited for High BP and anxiety . He gave medications and my BP normalised. Did not take money for next consultation. So humble soul .Definitely recommend
My father had a doubt of angioplasty or bypass . He guided us well and cleared all our doubts . We underwent bypass ,now my father is doing well .Thank you sir  n poornima hospital

Knows how to tackle and treat patients .
Very good and fast in decision making . 
Will definitely reccomend him for future.

Sasank sir treats well .
Angiography done for my sister in law by him.
Treats patients with good care
We have known Sir from when he worked in Gandhi hospital , So nice, smiling always , always patient friendly
My brother Capt Luthra came for checkup regarding increased heart beat . Simple treatment and thorough explanations of the condition were greatly appreciated.
